title: The Boiler Room
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Could build-your-own pizza with toppings like Daiya vegan cheese and mock meats (bacon, sausage, beef crumbles, pepperoni). Different veggie slice each day; on Tuesdays it's always vegan. The building is eco-friendly in that it is fully solar powered, some seats are recycled items and the bathroom doors are made out of old subway doors.
